name: Darn Tough Morgan Crew Light Socks - Women's
description: There's no horsing around with the comfort of these socks.  The merino blend keeps them itch-free and allows them to breathe. Seamless construction provides a smooth fit and assures no slipping, no bunching, and no blisters.Made of fine-gauge merino wool, nylon and spandex to keep you cool in the summer, warm in winter.Merino is naturally antimicrobial and keeps your feet from getting funky.True Seamless™ construction fuses seams for chafe-free wear.Darn Tough sources its wool from non-mulesed sheep.
